terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.introContent: "Sub-Buddy" (hereinafter referred to as the Service) provides an information matching platform to assist users in finding partners for streaming services. The Service only provides information exchange and group management tools and does not involve any payment processing.
terms.riskPaymentContent: : The Service does not handle any financial transactions. All payments occur privately between users (e.g., bank transfer). The Service is not liable for any fraud or financial disputes.
terms.riskAccountContent: : Sharing streaming accounts may violate the terms of use of some platforms. Users assume the risk of account suspension or termination.
terms.riskAccuracyContent: : Group information is posted by users. The Service does not guarantee its authenticity or accuracy.
terms.rulesIntro: You agree to abide by the following rules when using the Service:
terms.rule1: Do not post false, fraudulent, harassing, or illegal content.
terms.rule2: Do not maliciously abandon orders or fail to provide services after receiving payment.
terms.rule3: We reserve the right to suspend or delete accounts if malicious behavior is reported.
terms.changesContent: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. Significant changes will be announced on the site. Continued use of the Service constitutes acceptance of the revised terms.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.collectIntro: When you use "Sub-Buddy" (hereinafter referred to as the Service), we collect the following basic information via Firebase Authentication:
privacy.usageIntro: We use the collected data only for the following purposes:
privacy.usageIdentity: To identify your user identity for group management and chat functions.
privacy.usageDisplay: To display your avatar and nickname in group lists and chat rooms so other members can identify you.
privacy.usageReputation: To record your reputation score and past group history.
privacy.shareIntro: We will not share your personal data with third parties except in the following cases:
privacy.shareMemberContent: : When you join a group, fellow members can see your nickname and avatar for communication purposes.
privacy.securityContent: The Service uses Google Firebase cloud infrastructure. Your data is stored on Google's encrypted servers. We cannot directly access your Google login password.
privacy.contactContent: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to delete your account data, please contact the developer via {link}.
